lines.text: After a long trek through the Largosae hills, you arrive at the gates of the Highclaw Plains BEAST DUNGEON.
do you have to do that voice whenever you say 'BEAST DUNGEON'?
YES.
At the gates, you notice a knight laying down by a campfire. You have to shield your eyes from the light bouncing off their comically-well-polished armor.
As you approach, they stir and jolt up. *ahem cough cough ahem*
HALT TRAVELER. WHO GOES THERE?
i explain to the knight that-
A-ba-bap. You lost the bet, this session is IN character!
shit, right. last time i bet on Quizzil with you. okay:
fellow traveler, i am an adventurer! from the town of Hemiquaver. here to explore and brave this *ahem* BEAST DUNGEON. for GOLD.
That's the spirit! The figure stands up and lays a hand on the brass hilt of their sword.
Then you are here as competition? To rob the great and powerful knight Balthazar the Brass√®d of his rightful spoils?
and as i say this i start shuffling towards the entrance. super inconspicuous.
Your feet betray your honor, cur! Draw your sword and duel for the right to delve first!!
or we could just team up?
Ha! You waver, hare of Hemiquaver. Surely you have heard enough stories of me to know you will lose this fight.
you're right, i have heard enough. SCHWINK.
Schwink?
like- a sword drawing, man. let me have this.
Alright, so you schwink out your sword and schwonk it in front of you. Roll initiative for the tempo and pull up... BBDD Preset 1!
